title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NilIntroductory concepts, definitions, classification, nomenclature and architecture of polymers, molecular weight and its determination, basic aspects of step-growth and chain-growth polymerization, free-radical, ionic, condensation polymerization, copolymerization, stereochemistry, chemical modification of polymers, characterization of polymers, polymer solution, relevant aspects of polymer structure, physical properties of polymer systems, degradation and stabilization of polymer systems, introduction to biopolymers.Books: Polymers: Chemistry Physics of Modern Materials, 2nd edition, by J. M. G. Cowie; N. Thornes, 1991; Introduction to Polymers, 2nd edition, by R. J. Young and P. A. Lovell, Chapman and Hall, 1991.
